name: European Rural Community Alliance
legal: Voluntary organisation registered in Sweeden, Reg no. nr 802448-8713
membership: ERCA does not belong to any other organisationsd or network, however we have close working co/operation with other networks and organisations for rural development/
goal:
ERCA is a non-profit and non-govermental orgsanisation and network, at European, national and regional levels, that implement integrated cross-sectorial, Place-based and local rural development.
The oblectives of ERCA are
- To promote integrated, cross-sectorial, placed based and local rural deverlopment at the European level
- To enable informed debate on the future of rural areas and rural development
- To built on the collective strengths of the national and regionasl rural movements and empower them at regional, natiolnal and international levels and to support the formation of rural movments where they exist
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
ERCA is following the CAP and with priority of the Rural Develoments strategier on national and european level
ERCA has a seat in the European Network Assembly.
ERCA has a seat in the Commissionens Civil Dialogue Group for rural development
